tool_description: Crypto News API gives you the latest news on cryptocurrency from several newspapers
name: H Crypto News
title: H Crypto News

api_list.name: Latest News on Crypto
api_list.description: Returns the latest news  about crypto from several newspapers and websites
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://h-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com/cryptonews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "h-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://h-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com/cryptonews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "h-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
